flow:scan.description: Try to resolve the errors in the following flows:

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

failon.name: failon
failon.description: Thresold failure level (error, warning, note, or never) defining when the command return code will be 1

retrieve.name: retrieve
retrieve.description: Force retrieve Flows from org at the start of the command

sourcepath.name: sourcepath
sourcepath.description: comma-separated list of source flow paths to scan
